website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a closed wastebasket, but be gentle with the foot pedal.
pros: Closed lid keeps trash out of view
Metal is easy to wipe clean
cons: Can tip over when you step on the pedal to open it

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Trashcan Which Solved A Very Annoying Problem
customer_reviews.text: Really attractive little trashcan. Nice quality, lovely deep rich color. It's best feature? The lid keeps our naughty dog from foraging through the bathroom trash and bringing us his favorite finds as gifts while we sit on the couch. With guests.
customer_reviews.author: Alison W.

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman bronze step trash can, good idea, bad durability
customer_reviews.text: I have has this Simplehuman bronze step trash can for about 8 months now. I hate it. It came with a few small dents, but the color was nice so I kept it. The bronzing has continued to chip off around the edges with just regular use. It's horrible. And it was not roughly handled. It may still hold trash, but it has become trash itself. I will try the same color in a plastic wicker version from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with noticeable markings on the lid.
customer_reviews.text: Although very usable... I just wish I didn’t have to figure out creative strategies to conceal the silver patches on the lid... :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful but it's functionally flawed. When you step on the lever it tips and wobbles. I have a similar one that stays put when you step on it. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lenzmeier

customer_reviews.title: Does QC check the bottoms for rubber feet?
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of the small trash cans and a larger model for the kitchen, 4 cans in total (models CW1816, CW1833 and CW1180). For the step to work WELL, the cans must remain stationary. I was surprised that the new trashcans were sliding around the floor as I use the step. None of the cans came with all of the rubber feet. In fact, I only received 50% of the rubber feet. Two of my cans are the same model (CW1180), one can came with 3 feet, the other with only 1. These are great trash cans, but the QC on them is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Great can but has a flaw
customer_reviews.text: I really love this trash can - it's the perfect size and seems well made except that it looks like the can has a clear coating that was not applied properly near the bottom seam. I have attached a photo. I am returning it and will look for one in a store so I can see it before purchase. Otherwise wonderful little can. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: snugharbor2

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Very Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I'm an idiot and ordered the wrong size but the trashcan is perfect for my office. Keeping this one and ordering the larger one. The Lid closes slowly and quietly. Bag doesn't hang out where its visible. There is a separate insert that the bag goes in and when you put it back in the trash can, the bag is hidden. I've owned this one in the larger size before and the only reason i had to re-order was because someone sat on the trash can and the lid sunk in. They are great . Simple Human makes great products that last when treated with care!
customer_reviews.author: ErinMarie

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent little trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little trash can. I did not end up receiving this one that I bought through here so I went to the store to get the same one and I love it. The foot pedal is pretty simple and feels solid - I don't think that it will break any time soon. The stainless is supposed to be fingerprint free and as far as I can tell it is - I think it would take a significant smudge to actually see anything. The can itself can easily fit your typical convenience store plastic bag, though they give you a couple of bags designed for the can that are adorable and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Poor, cheap design. You won’t be happy unless its there to look at
customer_reviews.text: The lid closes with a resounding “clang” and is not pistoned or slowed in any manner. The lid will not stay open with out keeping your foot on the (awkward) pedal. The metal is beautifully polish to show fingerprints, but I think it very nice. However, it’s so light weight the the whole can lifts when you try to remove the interior liner. It’s a cool round design (from California) but its just not that functional. Embarrassing. I expected more for Simply Human.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a person living alone with not a lot of garbage output. Purchased it for my kitchen and it's lovely. I love the following: 10 year warranty fingerprint proof feature Inner tube can be removed soft close cover For all the folks wondering if a supermarket size plastic shopping bag will fit - yes....which I love because I re-use the bags as garbage bags.
customer_reviews.author: KWheatle

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and Sexy - and I'm talking about a trash can! Who ever thought. I'm in love with this design. Exactly as described - not too small yet big enough to get the job done! Doesnt take up too much space, trash bags included. Doesnt require excess maintenance. I highly recommend and am contemplating getting the bronze one for the "Queens" bedroom. Now, if I could only find a MAN that matches this CAN! 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cat litter
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of wasting endless amount of money on Genie refills. I have 3 cats and they get very cranky if their litter isn't cleaned up regularly (like most cats! lol) I was going through 1 refill of litter genie probably every week. Now, I keep this little garbage can, and use glade febreze small trash bags. Definitely saving money and the cats are happy :)
customer_reviews.author: quratolain a.

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy. Tips over.
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight. tips over when you press the pedal to open the lid. i tried placing a heavy tile under the inset bucket but there's no space between the bottom and the inset. very disappointed with simplehuman for putting such a flimsy product in their line.
customer_reviews.author: beetlekat

customer_reviews.title: High quality trash bins!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one to see how it is. I fell in love with it and purchased three more in white. I like how it is truly a fingerprint-free trash bin and how it doesn’t make a loud bang when closing. This comes with three garbage plastic bags for easy disposal. You can use the supermarket’s plastic bags when you ran out of it. Also, this has a warranty where you can register your product. Price could be better but I think price is right for the quality you’re getting. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grocery bag trash bags. ;)
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is perfect for small spaces. I like to repurpose plastic grocery bags as trash bags and this can is the perfect size for those bags. It actually comes with a few draw string trash bags made by the same company. Upon reading other reviews I was skeptical about it being flimsy when you put your foot on the lever to open the can. It does rock a little bit when you open it but you would have to stomp on it to completely knock the can over. The movement really isn’t a problem, and I do have it on hard floor not carpet if that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Bathroom waste basket
customer_reviews.text: My 10 liter wastepaper basket for the bathroom is perfect size for us- now the dog cannot get into it and bring out embarrassing items into the living room in front of visitors, or us. It is very high quality for the price and I love the bags that fit it perfectly, and the top is so secure that fruit flies cannot detect an odor and when company uses our bathroom, there is nothing for them to see. I think it is one of the best investments a person can make for their home.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using it in the kitchen for a while now, and we love the size and function. It’s not a big trash can, and it’s perfect because of that. We can reuse the green produce bags from the grocery, and taking out the trash every couple days minimizes the smell. The soft closure works wonderfully. Like other reviewers said, it does wobble a little if you step on the paddle hard and it’s empty. But we don’t find it to be unstable because of that. Overall, it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love the cans
customer_reviews.text: I like the smallness of the cans. It fits nicely between the toilet and the cabinet. I did not find that the can slipped or tipped over. We have tile in downstairs bathroom, no slipping, no tipping. Upstairs bathroom has vinyl flooring and still no tipping or slipping. The cans are small, so naturally one would not pound on the pedal to open the can. They hold enough that you empty it a few times a week and not jam it full. I laughed when I first saw it thinking, omg these are so small. But I gotta tell you, who wants a trash can to stand out in a bathroom. They work perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Product looks cheap and on top of that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Product looks cheap and on top of that they put 3 wide stickers on the top of the can to keep the lid closed can't get the sticky stickers stuff off the can . Terrible idea to do that with the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is really a cheap, lightweight product. Mine arrived dented as well, but no way was I getting a replacement. I even bought the special trash bags, and they go back as well. I have used these types of waste cans (stainless, high quality), and this one is so cheap. I would be so embarrassed to have it in my guest powder room, which is where it was going.
customer_reviews.author: JB So Cal 1

customer_reviews.title: It works, but arrived severely dented
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new trash can for my bathroom that has a lid to keep the dog out of it... I’ve had simplehuman products in the past so I decided on this one. When it arrived there was a huge dent in the side of it that took up almost the whole side of the trash can. My husband was able to push the dent out a little bit, but you can still tell it’s dented. It’s a trash can in my master bathroom so I’m not that worried about it, just annoyed that they would send a product with that large of a dent in it.. 🙄 great quality control...
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: I Ordered Three of These in Different Color/Finishes And All Three had Arrived and We're Delivered (In Pristine Condition !!!)
customer_reviews.text: These simplehuman Round Step, Stainless Steel, 4.5L/1.2 Gal Trash Cans, That Has A Durable Steel Pedal And A Removable Inner Bucket That Makes Trash Disposal Easy, And Which Are Also Available in Different/Multiple Finishes of your Choosing Preference, Are Perfect For Anyone or Everyone That Saves or Uses The Plastic Grocery bags from the grocery stores that you put your groceries in, when you take your groceries home. (You Know who You Are, if That's You, LOL !!!) These simplehuman Trash Cans and It's Size/or Capacity, Will/or Can Fit, These Type of Grocery bags as An Alternative Option Which Can Save You Money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris.C

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen a lot of down falls on this product due to them coming bent, color is off, top crooked etc but I purchased a black one and did my all around inspection and everything came in tact, nothing to say bad about it, I’m glad it came with 3 or 4 I think 🤔 bags that fit for the inside, it’s small / decent size for using it in bathroom/ room , for your make up items 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Monét

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage can but came pretty dented in the lid.
customer_reviews.text: This garbage can is great and from a company I like, Simple Human. I have a tall one for the kitchen that works great and just purchased this smaller can for the bathroom. Everything is great about it, except that the one I ordered from Amazon has a pretty big dent on the lid and doesn't look as sharp and one that isn't damaged. It was packed in two boxes, so I am sure the dent happened before being sent through the mail to me. Too bad there wasn't a quality check to make sure I was getting a new and undamaged item. Buyer be aware that this could potentially happen to you.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Too loud, lid slams shut unlike the other brand I have
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, the one I bought from Sams Club is much better but I couldn't find it again so had to go with this one. The lid slams down, which is loud and annoying. I would not buy one again! It looks okay although it should be just a little bit larger like the one I bought at Sams club. If you can find one that shuts slowly and quietly get it instead of this one. If you don't mind the very small size and the noise its okay. Thankfully this is in my guest bathroom so it's not used much. This brand is over rated!
customer_reviews.author: LOVETHEBEACH21

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces (bathroom)
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this same trash can from Target. I ordered two of them, and they sent them both together in a big box with NO bubble wrap or anything. Needless to say, they arrived very damaged. I returned those and ordered two from Amazon instead, they came the very next day individually wrapped and secure. It was a MUCH better experience. These cans are the perfect size for the bathroom, I love the bronze look and they are pretty good quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Vermeulen

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and the lid always shuts slowly and quietly without ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and the lid always shuts slowly and quietly without a problem. It's small: A good size for kitchens with little space. They also come with a 10 pack of a specific type of trash bags that you can reorder on Amazon. I recommend getting those liners, because they are the only ones that stay put. When we run out, we sometimes use grocery store bags, but they fall off all the time. Oh, and it comes with a removable container inside for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi 5000

customer_reviews.title: There is no hard insert so tour trash liner is always showing
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad trash can but I was really hoping it had a separate insert because I think it's really tacky that the trash bag shows even when the lid is closed ( Especially since I'm like most of the world and use grocery bags) The only way to make it not look unsightly is to not add a liner. I should have researched that better so I guess that's my badd. I just thought that all closed trash cans like this had those
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: NOT EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a small trash can for the bathroom, but i wasn't expecting THIS SMALL! love "SIMPLEHUMAN" products. I have their larger trash can for the kitchen. So i was excited to see they have trash cans for bathroom. This here, is WAY to small for my bathroom. It almost looks like for a kids play house or something. But overall, i still like SIMPLEHUMAN products and will continue to purchase other things from them.
customer_reviews.author: John “Mr. So ExQuiiSiiTe” Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Love the look.
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed that I have to give this bin 3 stars because I really want to like it. It looks as advertised, arrived on time (as promised), it’s great for small spaces and is very cute (for a trash can). It also arrived with some tiny sample garbage bags that are the perfect size. The inside is removable so you’re able to wash it. The issue is, if you throw anything with an odor in there, it’s difficult to get rid of the odor even though you wash it. Maybe the manufacturers can look into an odor free technology. That may be a good selling point :-)
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: 2 gallon trash cans and they're great. They hold more than it looks like
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of the simplehuman 1.2 gallon trash cans and they're great. They hold more than it looks like, but they are still small and out-of-the-way. I have 3 in my bathrooms, and 1 in my laundry room - have them in white, black, silver and bronze. The bronze did have a little of the color chip on the lid, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes You Don't Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Well, the color is great, don't really mind the banging lid BUT what's this about the "expensive, Letter B" liners fitting perfectly with a "no-show" on the outside. TOTAL Baloney!!!! We could have saved $15. bucks ... I'm off to chat with the company now about their false advertising -- that is, after I check this can for dents. After reading through a bunch more of these reviews I'm thinking I was a bit naive to just grab it out of the box (which by the way was ridiculously unprotected) and try to fit its huge (not snug) pantaloon liners over the top. Maybe it has dents too. :o/
customer_reviews.author: MissouriMule1

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a breadbox bigger than an ashtray.
customer_reviews.text: Don't tell anyone but once in a while I enjoy a cigar on the balcony. I don't like the smell inside the house so I needed something to empty the ash tray into. This is perfect. Small, yet heavy enough to stay where put. When full I simply remove the plastic shopping bag, tie it off, and toss it in the dumpster. Decent price, great item, quick delivery. (caution: make certain ash is not hot/lit before tossing in can)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Paratore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Small and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color, it matches the oil rubbed bronze shower and faucet in my bathroom. I'm not sure how long the color will last, though, as I noticed a little scratch where the lid meets the base and the silver color shows underneath. It is quite small, but I needed a garbage can with a lid because my dog gets into the trash, and this one matched my bathroom the best. I do like that the lid closes slowly and gently, no clanging sound.
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: No hunger, No worry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this automatic food feeder as a birthday gift for my daughter, a busy young woman being away from home a lot. The biggest worry she had was her two dearest cats being hungry. She was super excited to get this and deeply impressed by all the functions it has. It is easy to set up and schedule the right portion size and time as your own desire. It can record your voice by calling their names. It has plug in or battery choice. And further more, it is easy to clean. Looking at my happy and worry free daughter, I bought the second one for her!
customer_reviews.author: Xiqi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - Cheap plastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not worth the money that they charge for it. It is made of very cheap plastic and is as light as a feather. I can't imagine that this item will last very long. I am thinking of returning but I will have to weigh the pros and cons. If I could give it zero stars, I would. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Natnathi

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Just the fact mine broke after 2 weeks... it’s whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hardee

customer_reviews.title: Not for a bathroom with kids
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Was more of a chocolate tone and I needed oil rubbed bronze. Not easy to clean either and seemed to be another kind of metal not stainless. With kids it was not going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman brand is always the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd simplehuman pedal trash can I've purchased. One was a gift and 2 are in my home. They are superior quality products and worth every cent more than the competitors. I quickly went through 2 other brands over the years before replacing them with a large simplehuman can for my kitchen - it still operates perfectly and looks new after 12 years of nearly every day use. This newest smaller one if for a bathroom. I went with the brushed finish which comes with anti-fingerprint coating. It arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne W

customer_reviews.title: Dog 1. $25 trash can 0.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because new dog likes to shop for things to chew on from bathroom trash cans. Rave reviews from fellow dog owners with same issue made us think we had our solution. Dog literally watched me use it one time then walked over, stepped on the pedal, pulled out a wad of used Kleenex and trotted out the bathroom door. If she had a middle finger she probably would have given it to me on her way out. No idea why this can was $25..
customer_reviews.author: fatfrodo

customer_reviews.title: Good compact trash bin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted the lid to stay closed unless I stepped on the peddle. I was hoping this was going to be baby proof so my 1 year old couldn’t get into the garbage but he can easily lift the lid. It’s still a nice trash can, I like that you can take out the inner liner to empty it and not have to dump the whole bin with the lid and everything. It looks very nice and is a very compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size BATHROOM Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Simplehuman 10 Liter / 2.3 Gallon Stainless Steel Small SEMI ROUND Bathroom Step Trash Can is Brushed Stainless Steel. No fingerprints, no shining to make pretty. Fits perfectly between toilet and bathroom vanity. I have a small bathroom. Sample bags come with the trash can. Size C bags fit perfectly. This is one of the better purchases that I've made. Worth the price! Very sturdy, well engineered. Came fast and well protected. Recommend this bathroom step can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Ok trash can but does not meet expectations for a Simplehuman product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased a Simplehuman product and not been 100% satisfied. This trash can is too light. If you are not cautious when you step on it, it will wobble or fall over. I had to tape some weights to the bottom of the trash can to make it more stable. Other than that, the product is well made and attractive (as attractive as stainless steel trash cans can get).
customer_reviews.author: Turd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: High quality like all simple human products
customer_reviews.text: We redid our bathroom with black fixtures and did not want a silver trash can. We have cats that get into the trash so we need a lid. The lid opens easily and has a soft touch. Our other trash cans were not that much cheaper than this one, but they are clearly not the same quality. This product is not all the way black, it is more like a super dark gray/black.
customer_reviews.author: David Shefchik

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slam shut! Love that!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a trash can! Lol. It’s a nice trash can and even came with little trash bags, draw string and all. I like when you open it, it doesn’t slam shut after releasing your foot, it actually slowly closes. I have noticed it occasional gets stuck open but I just kind of tap it and the lid slowly starts to close on its own. Really really love that it has a mechanism to slowly close. Most trash cans with a foot lever just slams shut once you take ur foot of the open lever.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted a long time and we love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift that we received and we have loved it ever since. It fits nicely in our bathroom and is very modern looking. It does get pretty dirty over time but it has been very easy to clean. It is also nice that it comes with an insert that you can pull out and clean every once in a while. One downside is that it doesn't hide the plastic from bags very well so they stick out of the trash can. I think there are specially sized bags that you can use but it hasn't been worth it for us (we just use grocery bags).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, simple, great modern lines
customer_reviews.text: This thing really is smudge-proof, which is much needed because I use this is my bathroom trash can, so there are always used cotton buds/makeup remover, that kind of thing. Would recommend. Price is reasonable. Also the bottom of the trash can has rubber footing, which is nice because my old one would make a horrible scraping sound on my bathroom tiles. Kick to open feature works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works great
customer_reviews.text: My better half loves it. I hate it. Quality is very nice. Finish is very nice. What makes me hate it is that it slides backward a little each time you step on it to open. It ends up pushed all the way back by the tank and then has to be repositioned back to a place that it's usable. That's my personal annoyance. Quality wise it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Not soft closing, slams shut
customer_reviews.text: I am opening up a spa and chose to go with all simple human trash cans because I know they are a nice quality and quiet closing. This one is not the typical simple human soft closing type. I am actually wondering if it really is the brand it states or if it is a knockoff. I would love to exchange it for a new one in hopes that it is just a fluke but it is past the date of return.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love Simple human products because they’re so sleek and this little trash can is no exception. I got the 1.6 gallon in white and it’s the perfect size for my guest bathroom. And I’m not sure how they do it but it really is fingerprint proof! I bought a large trash can and dish rack from them too. They are a little pricier than other brands, but it’s so worth it for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Etesse, DDS

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and functional, should last a long time, doesn't fit regular garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: Not the sort of thing I usually spend money on, but elegant and functional and should be long lasting. Simplehuman might be the $100 boots that last ten years so you don't have to buy new $20 boots every year. I bought this for compostable waste to force myself to take it out frequently. You either need to buy special simplehuman bags or use a larger, regular shaped bag.
customer_reviews.author: sonnojoi

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment with a small dog and we needed a place to put his poo once he was done with his walk. Obviously, our trash can in the house just isnt going to work for me. So, I bought this and it works great. It seals in the smell as well so you never get that dog poop smell... until you open it, dear lord help me when you have to open it because it is nasty lmfao. All-in-all, it works great for what I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend - Trash Can with Internal Bucket and Liners
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little trash cans, perfect for a bathroom. This is my second one. They are made very well and come with a 10 year warranty. I bought the white one which has a hard baked-on finish that cleans very easily. The step opens the lid very smoothly and easily. Inside there's a removable plastic bucket that makes emptying a breeze. And the internal bucket can be easily washed out when needed. Added bonus: It comes with three 'perfectly-sized' disposable liners which I see now are also available on Amazon .. 60 A-sized liners for about $14. I highly recommend this trash can!
customer_reviews.author: GulfBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Nice but slides backwards sometimes
customer_reviews.text: We use the gold toned version in a guest bath that has gold hardware and it's perfect. It's truly smudge-proof and husky-proof. My only complaint is it slides backwards if you're not careful when you step to open, so I end up dragging it forward every few days. I'll plan to put it on a non-slid pad eventually when I'm annoyed enough.
customer_reviews.author: akosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Small but works great
customer_reviews.text: Just to make sure you get what you ask for.... This thing is extremely small. However it fits perfectly for me. We are using it for holding bags for when we clean the cat pan. The lid doesn't stay open very long, i would rather it did. The bin has another bin inside that you can pull out, it works well to hold thw A size custom bags. If you use grocery bags, they are a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R.

customer_reviews.title: Dog-proofed the trash
customer_reviews.text: My small dog (13#) is a determined paper-chewer and trash-digger. With the simplehuman plastic model, he simply nudged the lid open with his nose and voila! I bought the metal cans in both the 6 and 4 liter sizes and the floor is now trash free.
customer_reviews.author: WalksWithCats

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE HUMAN brand is the way to go!!! WOW
customer_reviews.text: I know it's only a trash can but when you are putting it in a remodeled bathroom it becomes important. I ordered a square trash can of a different brand because it was the only square one I could find. What a mistake. It came and it was dented. The top was discolored. It was made very poorly. SO, I remembered my Kitchen trash can that I have had for 5 years and love was a SIMPLE HUMAN. I went and found this one. It has exceeded my expectations. I will Never buy another brand. SIMPLE HUMAN is the way to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a fancy trash can or nice looking diaper trash can that you can use after diaper stage is done.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this as a diaper pail for our little one. The foot step and silent close lid have been wonderful while working with our baby. It comes with a sample pack of the simplehuman perfect fit trash bags which is nice however they are way over priced after that. We just use cheap small trash can bags you can get at any grocery story and they work just fine. We were worried the smell would get out but unless it's open, we really don't have any problem.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Study and seals well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in my room to throw away garbage that could attract bugs (e.g. food). It was the exact size as I expected (shout out to amazon for the extremely accurate AR view in your room feature). It closes and seals itself well and opens easily with the foot lever. It's small and looks great. Definitely worth the price for a metal garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these little wastebaskets I have purchased. Fits the small space in the bathroom and is attractive. The first actually is used on our covered outdoor deck and has held up for a few years and makes a handy place for the occasional discards in that space. Step on the pedal, drop trash in and let it close! Easy to lift out the basket, empty and rinse or wash out if necessary and drop right back in. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Jeva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for white bathroom and small space
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted this trash can because it matches my bathroom perfectly but I was afraid to buy it due to the reviews that say it wobbles and it makes noises. I went to a local store and tried and noticed that it doesn’t do any of those things so I went ahead and ordered it. As you can see from the pictures, it looks really nice, it’s shiny and it goes very well with everything in my bathroom. I don’t know if they fixed it but it doesn’t wobble and the lid closes silently.
customer_reviews.author: Iselashblue

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathroom, good quality and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find a can I liked in stores. Simple human never disappoints me. Looks nice, great size for a bathroom. Love the white metal option over plastic. Having the plastic liner to remove and wash as needed is very helpful. I bought the same size can at close to same cost and returned it because it seemed so cheap. This is made nice, quiet open/close. Doesn’t look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca I.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DENTED
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a circular trash can from them with no problem but with this model here there were multiple dents on the top of can. Huge inconvience as this was a gift for a house warming party. Second time buying from here because I loved my 1st can I bought but I’m now very disappointed. Love the design and color but this appears to be a recurring annoyance among customers that should stop being overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: Small, Compact
customer_reviews.text: Item received in perfect condition. I ordered the white stainless steel, in 6L size, and it fits the bathroom perfectly. Also love that the cover is soft-close. It comes with a few bags (size Code B), but I ordered more on the SimpleHuman site (price is best there, as well). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MountainView

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, looks as expected, little bit smaller than preferred.  Good CS for replacement of damaged item.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, metal construction. My first one had damage to finish on the pedal on arrival but was able to return and got replacement quite quickly. It's tough to "hide" the bag fully around that rim of the can insert, but the insert is still preferred to not having one at all. It's definitely small, good for bathroom but would be GREAT if they had a 10L version of this same style/shape for just a little larger use in larger master baths.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kitchen trash for low waste household
customer_reviews.text: I like this little buddy. I got him to downsize our giant kitchen trashcan because of stinky/buggy messes and the increased use of composting and recycling. Not sure what the whole fingerprintless thing is about because a) who is anal enough to care if there are fingerprints on your freaking trashcan?? B) other shit gets on it that looks much grosser than fingerprints (ie youre still gonna have to clean it). Also didnt know the whole quiet lid thing was a concern but I guess its nice. Sometimes gets wonky if the trashbag sticks up too much.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's nursery after the diaper munchkin broke. I should have just started with this product. It's style is very versatile-it is quite modern and clean looking. It keeps my son's diapers from smelling up the place, holds a decent amount and is super easy to use. It will look nice and be practical for his room as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Funny Bunny

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE AND WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: Some times pictures are deceiving and you end up with something that turns out to be junk. Not this. It is even better in person. I love the gold color, and finally finding a classy bathroom trash can that I can open with a foot pedal instead of an open basket. It looks nice and works well--a very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly 70

customer_reviews.title: The product is fine, but be sure this is really what you want.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. But that's about it. It is very small, which I wanted, but because it's so small and light, it was obnoxious to use. It was very easy to push it backwards when you go to open it or have it tip. We purchased this for a bathroom thinking it would be nice to have a lid. It isn't, not in our case. We have the larger version in the kitchen and love it, but this was a waste of money. I replaced it within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The Trash Liner Shows
customer_reviews.text: I was willing to pay too much for this trash can because it had the trash insert that would presumably hide the trash can liner. Unfortunately, the design on this trash can does not have the lid cover the insert so you can still see the line around the edge. I'm sad and disappointed with this design.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little trash can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces. I really love this little trash can. It's perfect for my tiny apartment bathroom. The hinge works really well so far & it doesn't have any problems with opening or closing. I also purchased the custom-fit liners & I recommend doing that if you're going to purchase one of these.
customer_reviews.author: heather ann

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pay attention to the measurements. It is good quality and matches perfectly but it is the smallest bathroom trash can I’ve ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Walters

customer_reviews.title: does what I want
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered another because this does exactly what I want for a decent price plus it comes with 3 trash liners. I keep this by my cats litter box for the stinky poo and it works perfectly. I ordered another for my back bathroom. I have a septic tank and if u throw feminine products down my toilet it will clog. I will have one of these in the stall for that purpose. I host all the holiday dinners and the gals will know what to do or they can write me a check on the way out for the plumber! lol..
customer_reviews.author: Calliekoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small trash can for guest bath
customer_reviews.text: It matches the oil rubbed bronze hardware in my remodeled half bath. We have dogs, so we have to have a covered trash can. It is small so it fits nicely. Has an inner liner that can be removed and washed, and you can purchase simple human bag liners that fit perfectly if you wish. There is only one feature it doesn't have that I miss--I had an older chrome, similar style trash can that had a handle in the back for lifting it up. This can does not have that. It's not a big deal, but the addition of that handle would make it more perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: martrhod

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Can, But Check for Dents in 6L Version
customer_reviews.text: Shipper put all five of the 6L cans in the same box without anything to protect them from banging into each other, and three of them arrived damaged. Apparently, the 6L version doesn’t get its own individual box, so you’ll want to check for dents/dings when they arrive. Otherwise, the cans look great! I had read that they are loud when you close the top, but with the plastic bags they are fairly quiet. The plastic bag cushions against / dampens any sound. I give the product 5 stars but the shipper 3 stars, so the product will get 4 total. The trash can company should provide 6L version with its own box, just like they do for 10L version.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love This ! Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute I really wanted a white trash can and this is white !!! super cute goes perfect in my room love it so glad I got white instead of chrome . It also comes with a little bag inside with small trash liners that fit perfect and you can;t see them from the outside . I also like that even inside the trash can it's white even the removable liner trash can Definitely happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the function. My one and only complaint is that it is not as heavy as I would like and does move easily, including when I step on the pedal to open the lid. The foot pedal and lid do work though which is wonderful. Overall good quality and nice finish. It is smudge proof which I really appreciate and fits in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wish It Wouldn't Move So Easily
customer_reviews.text: The trash can in and of itself is a great buy. I would have given it 5 stars but it doesn't want to stay in one place! It always ends up against the back wall and then the top hits the wall. I'll put rubber pads on the bottom or something but the manufacturer should heed this review.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Clean And Professional Medium Size Trashcan, And It Will Show Dings On The  Lid Surface
customer_reviews.text: This is a great medium size trash can for the bathroom. It looks very clean and professional. As others have stated, this trash can requires a custom liner, and will not work with grocery store plastic bags. I wish this item was more durable, as the lid already has a noticeable small ding on the rounded surface. I have not experienced any problem with the lid / step lever mechanism. I would purchase this medium trash can again.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding stinky trash
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kitchen trash can that I use for stinky things like meat scraps that I want to take out of the house more frequently than my larger trash can. This can is perfectly suited for just that. The lid comes down like a cap that forms a pretty tight seal around the top of the can. No smells get out! (Until you open the lid!)
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Lid came with a dent on the side
customer_reviews.text: The lid came with a small dent on the side of the lid. Zero damage on the outside shipping box or product box that came inside of it. I can only guess it append at the factory, it does not look like a return. The dent does not interfere with the operation of the lid and not worth my time to pack it back up for a replacement. But giving it 4 stars due to having cosmetic damage that was not from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: RV
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small bathroom trash can. Looks nice but I think I paid too much for it. Should be $15 instead of $25. Live and learn when you buy online
customer_reviews.author: Ketola

customer_reviews.title: Can isn't weighted so moves around - useless
customer_reviews.text: The can isn't weighted on the bottom, so if you press the pedal, it just moves all over the place (and doesn't open easily). I bought 2, returned 1, and just threw the other one out because it's basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: april h

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have soft close!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, fits in the small space well, but OMG it's so nice to have the soft close lid. It's the feature you never knew that you needed in a bathroom trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Clopton

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED WRONG COLOR
customer_reviews.text: ADVERTISED AS BLACK, RECEIVED WHITE COLOR. 1 STAR RATING FOR SENDING INCORRECT PRODUCT, THEN ASKING ME TO PAY FOR SHIPPING IN ORDER TO RECEIVE CORRECT PRODUCT I PAID FOR. YOUR MISTAKE IS NOT MY COST.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: B size special waste bag shows when lid is closed
customer_reviews.text: I love simple human products, especially how you have the inner rubbish bin so that the waste bag doesn't show. Well, on this small can no matter how I position the simple human special sized bag, it shows! Kinda crazy. Love the rose gold color for powder bath and that it soft closes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schoeneman

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the reviews showing the product arriving dented and scratched! But mine came with no issues at all. When I opened it, there was a fabric wrap around the trash can and another plastic bag over that. Maybe they changed the packaging to help with previous issues. Works well - matches the good quality that I expect from Simple human products. Comes with 3 custom fitting bags.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz P

customer_reviews.title: doesn't close with liner
customer_reviews.text: This trash can does not close with a liner in it. If you have anything with any type of odor, the odor will escape. If you do close it, it's nearly impossible to open. How can someone make a garbage can, supply their own liners and design it so it won't close? And even worse, manufacture it anyhow and sell it to people? I live rurally. It takes about a week to get anything. So frustrating. I bought a smaller one of theirs too. The hinge mechanism was dislocated and it didn't work. Both had been removed from their original boxes and put in one thin amazon box. This company is really suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for disposing of used cat litter in small apartment
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the lid automatically closes very softly when finished with disposing of what you are ridding yourself of - in my case used cat litter. I can completely empty the canister in two or three days without having a used cat litter smell. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Must have for women’s bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to dispose of feminine supplies! My dog is very disappointed now! He can no longer embarrass me when company is over and he decides to snack on feminine napkins! Gross! Problem solved and a perfect solution!!! Great quality always from Simple Human!
customer_reviews.author: SkaterGirl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute little trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little trash can. I bought it for our tinny little toilet closet (at least that is what I call the master bathroom toilet that is shut off from the rest of the restroom). It is a perfect fit. I wish it came in more colors i.e. purple and pink etc. If I think I might just buy a few more for the other bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: December

customer_reviews.title: REALLY light
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to do, this trash can is so light that using the foot pedal tips it over. I wish they intentionally weighed it down. I'm using it in my bathroom, so the trash in it is mostly going to be lightweight to begin with. Regardless, no brute force is being used, and if a 95lb woman with a size 6 shoe struggles to avoid knocking over this trash can, I'm not sure who could do it successfully :( I'm not returning it, because it looks nice, and I think I can probably figure out some way to weigh it down.
customer_reviews.author: fauxre

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, beautiful color and perfect for our bathroom with a bidet. We needed a small nice looking container to hold washcloths used to dry oneself after a bidet spray. It had to have a removable inside can so washcloths could easily be dropped into the clothes washer. Very nice product and we would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hager

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way too small wanted to charge $8.16 to return.... really. Well it says mini but please
customer_reviews.author: VANNDALZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bathroom trash can
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a simple, inexpensive bathroom trash can that not only would hide the contents of the trash, but also hide the hideous grocery bags we were using for it! This has been perfect. It’s tiny yet holds plenty, it’s super plain so it blends with bathroom decor, and I love how I can buy special trash bags for it that stay hidden. I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Colby

customer_reviews.title: Nicest trash container I have had for decades.
customer_reviews.text: This is way smaller than I expected. Looks good though and a lid on the bathroom trash can is great. Added 4 27 20.. we love this high quality product. I am going to look for a large one for the kitchen and another small one for wife being o so quiet with the cylinder closure. Ken Goodrich
customer_reviews.author: Ken Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Not quite like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and functional little garbage can. However, they advertise how quiet it is when it’s far from it. I’ve included a video.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly cause it was the only small trash can with a lid. When it came, I saw immediately it looked amazing. I opened it to get the papers out of the inside and it has a soft open and soft close mechanism. It came with 3 free trash bags made specifically to fit that trash can. It works great and looks awesome. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for kitty litter scoops
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews about how good this trash can is for kitty litter clump disposal, I bought it for that purpose. I'm happy with the size, appearance, tight fitting lid, and pedal lever operation. I saw where someone said the lid stayed up for them and I hoped that had been a permanent improvement since others had said it didn't stay up, but nope, the lid won't stay up for me either. To me that is its only flaw, so I rounded up my 4.5 rating instead of rounding down.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great classy and compact design
customer_reviews.text: Great classy and compact design. With the can so low to the ground, the foot pedal is a must. YES: All the negative review comments are true, in that the can's light weight makes it unstable out of the box. BUT: With any number of simple household modifications, this can be totally overcome. Personally, I just put a small 3lb weight in the bottom of the can, and now it stays on the ground when I open it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ketcham

product_meta.title: simplehuman 4.5 Liter / 1.2 Gallon Round Bathroom Step Trash Can, Stainless Steel, Rose Gold
product_meta.description:
Style Name:4.5 Liter Round| Color:Rose GoldPerfect Small Round Step Can 

The simplehuman 4.5 Liter / 1.2 Gallon compact stainless steel round step trash can is the ideal choice for any home's bathroom or office with its iconic round shape that fits in corners, against the wall – just about anywhere. And its stylish rose gold stainless steel finish enhances any home decor.

Strong Steel Pedal The strong steel pedal means the can is hands-free and is engineered for a smooth and easy step. It also gives this waste bin stable operation for a "big can feel."

Custom Fit Trash Can Liners simplehuman Code A trash can liners are a perfect fit for this trash can. They are made from extra-durable plastic with thick double seams to prevent rips and tears and have been rated among the top in strength comparable to other major brands. Extra strong to keep garbage in the bag — not on the floor or the bottom of your trash can.
feature_bullets: 10-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
CODE A CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience.
PERFECT FOR SMALL SPACES - Fits well in bathrooms, offices or wherever space is limited.
STRONG STEEL PEDAL - Engineered for a smooth and easy step – gives stable operation for a "big can feel."
REMOVABLE INNER BUCKET - Lifts out for easy trash disposal.
FINGERPRINT-PROOF FINISH - Resists smudges to keep stainless steel shiny.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars14,454 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Warranty Card 10 year^Sample 10 pack Code A Custom Fit Liners
